messages.text: Hello Sarah, I'm interested in math tutoring for my daughter who's in 10th grade. Do you have availability this week?
Hi Emma! I'd be happy to help your daughter with math. I have slots available on Wednesday and Friday afternoons. Would either of those work for you?
Friday would be perfect. She struggles with algebra particularly. Could you focus on that?
Absolutely! Algebra is one of my specialties. Let's start at 4pm on Friday. I'll prepare some materials specifically for algebra concepts. Looking forward to meeting you both!
That sounds great. Thank you so much!
Hi Michael, I saw your profile and I need help with my physics coursework, particularly mechanics and thermodynamics.
Hello Alex! I'd be glad to help you with physics. Those are areas I specialize in. Are you looking for regular sessions or help with specific problems?
I think I need regular sessions. I'm falling behind in class and have an exam coming up in three weeks.

I understand. Let's schedule twice weekly sessions to get you caught up before the exam. I can start this Thursday if that works for you. We'll focus on building a strong foundation in mechanics first.
Thursday works great. What time would be best?
How about 5pm? And we could do Tuesdays at the same time as well. I'll send you some preliminary materials to review before our first session.
Perfect! Thanks for your help. I'm looking forward to our first session.
